It's just a skinner box. If you played COD zombies to absurdly high rounds, you already know how this game plays. 

Yes there's teamwork, yes there's a few unique weapons, but none of that matters due to how bland the gameplay is.

The only fun class is sharpshooter because you have to care about where you aim.

Every other class is a variant of looking at the enemies and pointing at their general direction, with medic being the most deviating by including teammates in that regard.

If you're gonna get this game anyway, do yourself a favor and use cheat engine to skip the grind.
fun

Played this game for over 10 years now and its great to this very day, it did obviously age over time comparing to other games but it still looks and plays nice to this very day. Has a great soundtrack, plenty of weapons and lots of characters before tripwire dropped support on this game making this game playable for years and years. There are plenty of live servers and the game will run on just about any hardware or laptop as its very well optimized. Definitely recommended and check out the KF2 as well.

Killing Floor, is a Souls-Like game and one of the Best FPS(For Puck Sakes) game. Memeable and everyone around you blames you. It is vital to only play with friends not random plebs because this game aged like a fine wine powered by peoples emotions from Garrys mod who complain how hard it is to beat sandbox mode.

The game Traverses you in the city of London where apparrently some derranged Mad Scientist decides to experiment 964,672 soldiers to test to make them bajeesus super soldiers. 
The experiments failed and causes a wild outbreak in the city of london. But you are not alone. You and your team(that inflicts emotional trauma) will be by your side telling you how to play the game and tells you how bad you play. 

The team genre consists of retarded Elitist, solipsist and a psychopath and an idiot.
You have a trader who has a shop and tells you how she likes big co00cks and just magically teleports in the farther distance once you finish the wave.

The Trader realizes how broken the trader mechanics is by selling her duals you get more money and that is a very well known fact. Bankruptcy. 
You will have to buy what you need in 60 seconds because you will bankrupt her from your scrummy cash and shady transactions.
Like Genshin Impact, you and your mentally derranged teammates must work together to beat your enemies to the pulp using armament juicers to get the feel of that freshly mown babies.

Often times your teammates kept dying for dumb reasons has turned into a liability and it is now up to you to raise him/her until your team succeeds. 

Your cash comes every testicle shot from the zombies. 
After finishing the inducing overpowered franticism your teammates loses their sanity in the last wave and will disconnect from the game and becomes anti social whenever you show up in the next session. 

For a survival game. You will gain no benefits but only pain. Only misery and that's how cringe edgelords are made.
It is now up to you to beat the boss with 6 player health or you will get culture canceled

买新不买旧，何不二代?
更好的打击感
更好的手感
更多的武器
更多的职业
更多的敌人
更好的联机
如果你说怀旧那当我没说
毕竟老游戏有诸多BUG和玩起来难受的地方以现在的眼光来看是挺烂的
例如不能在装弹期间换武器,要装好才能换，这期间如果面前有怪那就完犊子
还有不能跑步只能拿小刀加移速
没有新手教程就像是教你WASD左键开枪，然后让你去打世纪BOSS 样
升级条件高，像什么爆几千个头啊这些的满级和未满级的差别很大的，先不说伤害，人家满级复活带
武器和护甲的，没满级就把9mm手抢
矮人斧成就因BUG而无法解锁只能用SAM
服务器锁帧84FPS，你让144FPS玩家如何是好 (只有本机才能突破此限制)
且游戏的联机体验较差。取决于你与服务 器之间的连接，以及数据都是服务器计算的，有可能你看到丧尸的头在这，但是服务器在另边，你自己眼里打它打到头喷血了，服务器算你打飞了，在很多情况下差那么俩发打死丧尸却因为这狗屎判定而丢了命
刷怪机制也狗屎，我打开门，嗯很好很安全，关上，门一会就自动开了，丧尸全家过来问候
且游戏价格昂贵，都2019了 这游戏不值挂着19港币的份钱。
而且DLC也是39- 59的价格，不买的话游戏体验减半。别和我提什么打折MOTHER FK
打分3/10这3分只是给KF这个IP上
如果放在10年前，那肯定是好游戏，8/10分不是梦 但是今天是2019年
----------我想说的几点---------
1.这个评测不是我写的，原作者是妖梦，他本来是杀戮间吧的小吧务，因为他在steam上发了这个差评，导致许多杀戮间一代粉丝喷他并把他挂在贴吧里。吧主懒小丁警告他并要求他删除此评测，他删除了评测，并在之后又恢复了评测，这导致他失去了杀戮间小吧务的职务。
2.我发这个评测，并不是因为我真的觉得杀戮间1很垃圾，是为了表达对那些容不下别人不同看法的狭隘遗老们的抗议。Steam评测区本来就该自由发表对游戏的看法，凭什么你不许别人给差评？你算老几？买游戏的钱是你出的？
我看到吧主在挂人贴里强调妖梦的数据是“65.6小时，而不是656小时”，我觉得这句话简直可笑，难道他玩了60小时的游戏就没资格给差评？一个别人不喜欢的游戏，都玩了60个小时了还不够，还要强迫人家玩600小时才能给差评，是不是有病？我游戏时间就几分钟，照样给差评，你们是不是气得脑门都冒烟了？
3.我不认识妖梦，本评测纯粹为了让那些狭隘的一代遗老们不爽，你越不让我发差评我就越要发差评，我就是喜欢和你们对着干~

Игра получилась супер . Все начинается с 0 уровня у тебя мало хп мало урона и тебе приходится убегать а когда уже доходишь до 6 то понимаешь что есть уровни сложности и покруче . Музыка тут хороша и графон неплох но есть 1 что меня бесит . Когда ты прыгаешь и под тобой появляются зомби а ты находился гденибудь на лестнице то ты улетишь нахуй в ебеня и потеряешь 90 хп . Стрельба тут прекрасная последний раз так приятно было пострелять в пей дее или в код нейм кюр . Мне только не понравилось что из боссов токо патриарх а так игра бомба советую всем!

Upon looking back at the title from years after its release, it holds up really well with graphics, gameplay mechanics, and overall synergy. My only complaint would be that there is 1 or 2 dialogue lines and you almost always hear the same line repeated constantly which can get a little annoying. The weapon choice feels semi limiting, but overall considering how old this game is, It's near perfect. 9/10

Sin dudas mi elección favorita a la hora de destrozar repetitivamente por placer zeds !
valla que juegazo, este es uno de esos juegos en donde su sabrosura esta en la repetitividad sumado al gore, si esto es lo tuyo, este es tu juego.

Excelentes mapas, hasta 6 jugadores, 7 clases, 4, 7 u 10 oleadas de zeds preparados para morir bajo tu zed de sangre y un jefe final listo para follarte por matar a sus hijos xd para que hablar de la las horas extras de juego de los servers mods con mas de 10 clases más de 60 lvl para subir a tu pj ! , excelente comunidad y muy fiel y presente pese a los años de esta joyita, lo recomiendo 100%, espero disfrutar de esta belleza hasta el día que muera <3

Killing Floor is very fun / relaxing for me. Really wish those peps who runs severs with custom perks actually let you level up properly instead playing lv 0 in a lv 100 hunting ground. Some severs already did this (Example like you are level 0 but with a bonus lv 10, so you don't instantly die the moment you spawned) and they are thriving with players who always come back and newbs to join. Don't expect much of the community tbh but they will guide and help you (sometimes). 

Yeah other than that I really recommend this over it's younger brother Killing floor 2. Mainly because the content updates always messed up the custom mods / builds that people worked so hard on. But hey it's only my opinion.

I would recommend this game to those that like killing zombies and teamwork. 

There are different roles and each one are important in teaming up killing zombies. I have played this game when it first came out and it was just amazing. I did max out all the roles, but they increased the max level on them. Each have great perks and such.

Of course it's really fun playing with friends. Playing solo is equally fun too. When I solo and play with strangers, I use to troll and let my teammates die and I finish the round of zombies by myself. I think it's more intense and exciting.
